body:
Seeing a few instances of this in our Jenkins, e.g. https://storage.cloud.google.com/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/31e33ac58bed65e1f054ac610bc74888f05b991e/kubernetes-pull-test-unit-integration/10333:

This is maybe Go 1.5.3 related? not sure.

@kubernetes/kube-mesos

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a flaky test.
labels.name: kind/flake

title: data race in k8s.io/kubernetes/contrib/mesos/pkg/scheduler/integration
